## Introduction

In this part, I list the ldsc results for FLASH factors.

I made several plots to show the enrichment and 95% confidence intervals for each factor. Enrichment here is the proportion of prop.h2 devided by prop.snp.

**In the results, the annotation end with '.narroPeaks' and '.OpenChrom' are our own annotations. Others are ldsc-provided annotations.**

## Results-maf001

The covariants of the association test here are lv5,85,44,47,98,2,33,23,63,15,57,71,99,83,18,50,7,65,68,94(heritability = 0.000001, sorting by pval_test_l).

I performed ldsc for lv95,20(lowest pval_test_l from [prediction model](https://xsun1229.github.io/factor_analysis/train_plier_allpathway.html), 0.011,0.013,) and lv75(highest heritability, 0.99)

## Results-maf005

The covariants of the association test here are lv55,73,44,18,97,83,5,74,71,57,47,58,84,50,82,31,45,6,15(heritability = 0.000001, sorting by pval_test_l).

I performed ldsc for lv26,20(lowest pval_test_l from [prediction model](https://xsun1229.github.io/factor_analysis/train_plier_allpathway.html), 0.013,0.015,) and lv92,86(highest heritability, 0.9999)
